The SURGE Framework

We use a proprietary 5-stage framework to develop your entrepreneurial mindset:

  • S

    Self Awareness

    Understand your strengths and opportunities

  • U

    Understanding

    Spot market opportunities and gaps

  • R

    Resilience

    Build the grit to overcome challenges

  • G

    Growth

    Execute and scale your solutions

  • E

    Entrepreneurial Leadership

    Lead teams and inspire change
